entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as the next person to be targeted by the boggart. He leapt forward when his name was called.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is watching Ron and seems to think he has frozen for a moment.

entities.name: lavender brown
entities.description: Lavender Brown is mentioned as running away from the spider that Ron had just defeated with his spell.

entities.name: professor lupin
entities.description: Professor Lupin is mentioned as hurrying forward to help Neville and shouting 'Riddikulus!' to defeat the boggart.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is mentioned as being told by Professor Lupin to finish off the boggart. He charges forward looking determined.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is mentioned as coming back and Neville is told to finish him off.

relationships.description: Ron defeated the boggart with his spell 'Riddikulus!'
Professor Lupin defeated the boggart with his spell 'Riddikulus!'
Neville attempted to defeat the boggart but it was already defeated by Professor Lupin.
Snape is implied to have been defeated by Neville.
